pkgmetadata.longdescription: =====================Blazar Tempest Plugin=====================Tempest plugin for Blazar ProjectIt contains the tempest plugin for the functional testing of Blazar Project.* Free software: Apache license* Documentation: https://docs.openstack.org/blazar-tempest-plugin/latest/* Source: https://opendev.org/openstack/blazar-tempest-plugin* Bugs: https://bugs.launchpad.net/blazar
